pkgmetadata.longdescription: # AIO NetboxAn asyncio netbox library that conforms to any running netbox via it's OpenAPI spec## InstallationAIONetbox is distributed as a library intended to be included in other asyncio python projects. It has been developed on python 3.6+ though 3.8 is recommended.```pip install aionetbox```## Usage```from aionetbox import AIONetboxnetbox = AIONetbox.from_openapi( url='http://localhost:8000', api_key='0123abcd')sites = await netbox.dcim.dcim_sites_list()my_site = await netbox.dcim.dcim_sites_read(id=2)custom_field_sort = await netbox.dcim.dcim_regions_list(cf_sf_id='identifier')```Each module and method map to the swagger definition for netbox (`/api/docs`)![](https://imgur.com/Mhs4UHz.png)
